images.location: Foundation – Load Bearing Edge at Cross-Ties
images.text_verbatim:
SLOPE AWAY 2% GRADE & INSULATION (IF PRESENT)
(3) 15M REBAR @ TOP
DIAMETER AND PROJECTION AS PER STEEL DWGS. HILTI KWIK BOLT 3 WEDGE ANCHORS MIN 4" EMBED OR HILTI HAS CARBON STEEL THREADED ROD WITH HILTI HIT-HY 200 SAFE SET SYSTEM MIN 4" EMBED OR EQUIVALENT ANCHORS
(2) 15M HOOKED BARS
6"x6"-6/6 WWM OR 10M GRID @ 10" o.c.
MIN. 2" (R10) OF EXTRUDED POLYSTYRENE MIN. COMPRESSIVE STRENGTH OF 30 psi c/w 6 mil POLY
COMPACTED GRANULAR 'A'
(3) 15M REBAR @ BTM
SECTION - Load Bearing Edge @ Cross-Ties
SCALE: 1/2" = 1'-0"
images.summary: This section view illustrates the load-bearing edge at cross-ties of a foundation. The section shows a slope away of 2% with grade and insulation if present. The reinforcement includes (3) 15M rebar at the top and bottom, and (2) 15M hooked bars. Anchors are specified as Hilti Kwik Bolt 3 Wedge Anchors with a minimum 4-inch embedment, or equivalent. The section includes a 6"x6"-6/6 welded wire mesh or a 10M grid at 10 inches on center. The foundation is insulated with a minimum of 2 inches (R10) of extruded polystyrene with a compressive strength of 30 psi, covered with 6 mil poly. The base consists of compacted granular 'A'. The section is identified as 4/S1, indicating its location on the sheet.

images.text_verbatim:
SLOPE AWAY 2% GRADE & INSULATION (IF PRESENT)
(2) 15M REBAR CONT. HOOKED AT END. (SEE S0 FOR COVER)
6"x6"-6/6 WWM OR 10M GRID @ 10" o.c.
MIN. 2" (R10) OF EXTRUDED POLYSTYRENE MIN. COMPRESSIVE STRENGTH OF 30 psi c/w 6 mil POLY
COMPACTED GRANULAR 'A'
(2) 15M REBAR @ BTM
SECTION - Non-Load Bearing Edge
SCALE: 1/2" = 1'-0"
images.summary: This section view details the non-load bearing edge of a foundation. It features a 2% slope away with grade and insulation if present. Reinforcement includes (2) 15M rebar continuous and hooked at the end, with a note to see S0 for cover details. The section specifies a 6"x6"-6/6 welded wire mesh or a 10M grid at 10 inches on center. Insulation consists of a minimum of 2 inches (R10) of extruded polystyrene with a compressive strength of 30 psi, covered with 6 mil poly. The base is compacted granular 'A'. This section is labeled as 3/S1, indicating its reference on the sheet.

This plan view shows the overall layout of the floating slab foundation. The slab measures 24 feet by 35 feet, with grid lines labeled 1-4 horizontally and A-G vertically. The plan includes section callouts 1/S1, 2/S1, 3/S1, 4/S1, and 5/S1, indicating where sections are cut through the plan. The dimensions provided include 35'-0", 13'-6", 10'-9", and 24'-0", outlining the slab's overall size and grid spacing. The plan is essential for understanding the structural layout and reinforcement details of the foundation.

images.summary: This section view illustrates a typical load-bearing edge of a foundation. It includes a 2% slope away with grade and insulation if present. The reinforcement consists of (3) 15M rebar at the top and bottom. The section specifies a 6"x6"-6/6 welded wire mesh or a 10M grid at 10 inches on center. Insulation is provided by a minimum of 2 inches (R10) of extruded polystyrene with a compressive strength of 30 psi, covered with 6 mil poly. The base is compacted granular 'A'. This section is identified as 2/S1, indicating its location on the sheet.

MIN. 2" (R10) OF EXTRUDED POLYSTYRENE MIN. COMPRESSIVE STRENGTH OF 30 psi c/w 6 mil POLY
(2) 15M REBAR CONT. HOOKED AT END (SEE NOTES FOR COVER)
COMPACTED GRANULAR 'A'
SECTION - Intermediate Thickening
SCALE: 1/2" = 1'-0"
images.summary: This section view shows the intermediate thickening of a foundation. It includes a minimum of 2 inches (R10) of extruded polystyrene with a compressive strength of 30 psi, covered with 6 mil poly. The reinforcement consists of (2) 15M rebar continuous and hooked at the end, with a note to see additional notes for cover details. The base is compacted granular 'A'. This section is labeled as 5/S1, indicating its reference on the sheet.
